channel.title: MESG Product Update - Aug '19
channel.description:
This month, we have a new experimental feature, the workflow engine! Plus we have new updates: Engine v0.12, CLI v1.2 and JS library v4.2. Check out the highlights below.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/mesg-product-update-4/
